Title: US gets warrant to seize plane owned by Russian oil firm Rosneft
Description: The U.S. District Court for the Eastern District of New York authorized the seizure, based on violations of export controls and sanctions against Russia, the Justice Department said.

Title: 2023 Layoff Tracker: Lockheed Martin And Hunter Douglas Reduce Headcounts

Title: GE Chief Says Premature To Talk About 2025-26 Engine Supplies
Description: General Electric Co Chief Executive Larry Culp said on Thursday it was "premature" to talk about engine production volumes for 2025 and 2026, but dismissed speculation about a rift with planemakers on jetliner production plans.

Title: A Helicopter is Going to Titan. Could an Airplane be Next?

Title: GE Sees Aviation Revenue Boost From Jet Engines; Shares Hit Highest Since 2018
Description: General Electric Co forecast revenue at its cash-cow aviation business to grow by at least low-double digits through 2025, sending its shares to levels not seen since 2018 on Thursday.
